#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#define max 1000001
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	
	long long unsigned int a,b,ans,f1,f2,temp;
	while(scanf("%llu%llu",&a,&b))
	{
		if(a==b&&a==0)
		{
			break;
		}
		ans=0;
		f1=1;//lower limit
		f2=2;//upper limit
		while(1)
		{
			if(f1>b)
			{
				break;
			}
			if(f1>=a)
			{
				ans++;
			}
			temp=f1+f2;
			f1=f2;
			f2=temp;
		}
		printf("%llu\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
